cause.description:
This is a cause for everyone on facebook that values any human rights what so ever. As you know the world is turning into a total police state nightmare. THE REAL ID IS COMING TO CANADIAN WALLETS NEAR YOU IN 2008. This has a little tracker inside which uses gps RESIST THIS IT IS KNOWN AS THE MARK OF THE BEAST SO LETS STOP THESE KILLERS.
1. Infowarrior
cause.mission: OVERTHROW THE NEW WORLD ORDER WITH FACTS AND KNOWLEDGE
cause.name: STOP THE NEW WORLD ORDER SCUM
